text: LA-40 is a constituency of Azad Kashmir Legislative Assembly which is currently represented by Muhammad Ahmad Raza Qadri of Pakistan Muslim League (N). It covers the area of Attock District Rawalpindi District (except Rawalpindicity) Islamabad in Pakistan. Only refugees from Kashmir Valley settled in Pakistan are eligible to vote. ==Election 2016== elections were held in this constituency on 21 July 2016. Category:Government of Azad Kashmir Category:Constituencies of Pakistan
title: Constituency LA-40
